attributes.action: Hold Internet providers more responsible for SPAM and its reduction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
95% of all internet traffic is caused by SPAM.   
SPAM mail is an issue that affects us all, our families and friends, and fools your dear old mum to part with her life savings to a Nigerian Prince.

Internet providers need to be held more responsible, how, well for a start they can detect where the mail is coming from, the internet is made up of millions of interconnecting gateways.

If the end user IP banned traffic from another gateway until they stopped spam, then that would cause a chain reaction up the chain, as they all began banning connections causing spam. 

Why would they do this, simple, people would stop using providers who are banned from accessing other providers and begin using the "friendly" suppliers.  The offenders would begin losing genuine customers and lots of cash money.  SPAM would become a non-money maker as it wouldn't be getting through, so they would need to comply or die.
